product_name: BeautyBioThe Eyelighter Concentrate Serum & Depuffing Tool
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe Eyelighter Concentrate Serum & Depuffing Tool from BeautyBio is a smoothing, brightening & priming serum + depuffing tool with Vitamin C & plant-powered retinol.
details: DetailsBenefits2-in-1 eye serum and depuffing tool depuffs, smooths lines and brightens dark circles while creating a creaseless surface for undereye concealer applicationPlant-powered retinol gently mimics the benefits of clinical-grade vitamin A, firming and smoothing skin with zero irritation or dryness, ideal for sensitive skin typesAcid-free vitamin C diminishes discoloration, smooths texture and brightens tone for healthier looking skinMoisture-locking hyaluronic acid and squalane help support skin's protective barrier functionCooling applicator contours under the eye for instant depuffingKey IngredientsPlant-Powered retinol replicates the skin-smoothing effects of traditional vitamin A without any dryness, irritation, redness or sensitivityAcid-Free Vitamin C A gentle, non-irritating form of this brightening wonder-vitamin that helps diminish discoloration, repel free radicals and rewind dullnessHyaluronic Acid boosts skin's moisture levels for a consistent healthy glow and plumps out the appearance of fine lines for a totally smooth, creaseless surfaceSqualane A more stable form of squalene that rehydrates skin, strengthens its barrier to prevent moisture loss and softens rough, uneven textureResearch ResultsClinically proven to improve brightness, fine lines, puffiness and dark circles after 1 useItem 2592881How To UsePump and glide concentrate onto eye area in the AM & PM after cleansing. Tap product with finger after applying to smooth finish. May use on its own or underneath AM makeup application as a primer.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau,Trisiloxane, Propanediol, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Lauryl Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Diglycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bidens Pilosa Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Mica, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane,Tocopherol, Alcohol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Pump and glide concentrate onto eye area in the AM & PM after cleansing. Tap product with finger after applying to smooth finish. May use on its own or underneath AM makeup application as a primer.

reviews.headline: Awesome product love it use daily
reviews.comments: I received this in my Trendmood box I love it I noticed a big difference

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: Such a great product!! Love it so much!!

reviews.headline: Awesome depuffing tool
reviews.comments: I received this in my Trendmood box and was so excited to try it!  I am a fan of BeautyBio products and this so soothing on your skin!

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I recieved this item courtesy of trendmood box. I wake up with very puffy eyes and this product has definitely helped. It has reduced puffiness while also brightening the undereye area.

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: I received this product in the latest Trendmood box and absolutely love it! It is refreshing and brightening on the eye area. It is perfect for hot summer mornings. Gets rid of puffy eyes and the cooling feeling is nice. I would recommend ir for all ages but specially 30+

reviews.headline: 100000000000/10 recommend!!!
reviews.comments: I have been eyeing this for a LONG TIME and received it in my Trendmood box & it DID NOT disappoint! I use this every morning before applying makeup and I can tell a difference. The applicator feels so cooling and the serum makes my undereyes feel so smooth.

reviews.headline: Love Beautybio eyelighter concentrate
reviews.comments: I received this product in the last Trendmood Box. It is the nicest under eye moisturizer that I have ever used. My eyes feel better using it and I love how it dispenses thru the cool tool and the end of it that fits perfectly around my eye.

reviews.headline: This is as great under eye primer!
reviews.comments:
I received this product in my Trendmood Box and I really like it! I have another product that I've used for years so I'm not sure I'm ready to switch yet, but I have to say it's really growing on me! I love the applicator and the product melts into your skin beautifully. I'm using it as a primer now and it's working great!
If you're in the market for an eye product, give this one a try!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Takes a minute to rub in but the final product is beautiful, thanks to trendmood for lettibg me try this in my box!

reviews.headline: Not the best but not the worst eye cream
reviews.comments: Got this is my Trendmood box I love the cooling depuffing tip but the formula is a bit thick so not as easy to spread solely with the tip. I have to do extra patting and rubbing to get it to absorb properly. My only complaint.

reviews.headline: Good brightening eye cream
reviews.comments: I like this brightening eye cream better than a lot of other of the others on the market. it brightens and feels great, it just takes a very small amount of extra effort to rub in.  the pen is easy to use and the applicator feels great. I've def been reaching for this more over the other eye brightening creams and have been liking it's effectiveness and ease of use.

reviews.headline: First time
reviews.comments: Got this item in the trendmood box very excited to try it out promising results

reviews.headline: Super cooling product
reviews.comments: Does what is advertised (its actually cooling) and smells great!!

reviews.headline: Love it so much!
reviews.comments: I really am loving this product! Very nice & seems to work nice. So happy to have received this in my Trendmood box!

reviews.headline: Game changer!
reviews.comments: So far, this eyeliner is my number one find of the year, thanks to receiving it in my Trendmood Box No. 31! I can't recommend it enough! It's incredibly lighweight and hydrating, the cooling applicator head helps to depuff, brighten and smooth my under eyes, giving me a more rested appearance in the early mornings.

reviews.headline: Obsessed with the glow and de-puffing effect!
reviews.comments: This is honestly one of the only products that instantly makes a difference for my under-eyes. It brightens, cools, and smooths out puffiness in seconds — perfect before makeup or even on bare skin. The metal tip feels super refreshing, and I love the texture: light but effective. I've already recommended it to two friends and I'll definitely repurchase!

reviews.headline: Nice cooling effect
reviews.comments: I got this in my Trendmood box.  I love the applicater, it has a cooling effect, not the product itself, the applicater. I am not sure if it is doing anything but it does hydrate my eyes.  It has a nice texture!  It's comforting on my eyes.  Nice serum.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I received tbis in a Trendmood Box and I love it! It makes the crepe looking area around my eyes look hydrated and smooth. I love the eay it applies and feels on my skin.

reviews.headline: I love the applicator.
reviews.comments: I received this in a trend mood box. I love the applicator and how light and moisturizing the product is. It's perfect for prepping under make up. It layers beautifully under make up. It's light and not too thick. It has a nice illuminating effect. I would definitely recommend This ice cream.

reviews.headline: depuffs well
reviews.comments: I like this product. it depends well for me, but I still notice it wearing off as the day goes on! maybe with more usage it'll last longer. but for now it gets the job done!

media.headline: Instantly brightens and depuffs — new holy grail!
Brightened my under eyes almost immediately!
Feels amazing on under eye skin!
media.caption: after one week of use

media.headline: Feels amazing on under eye skin!
media.caption: before

media.headline: My new favorite and MUST have skincare product
media.caption: New favorite product

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using this product for the last three weeks and it's become one of my favorite skin care products.  I use it in the morning and night and now I never miss a day.

I had noticeable bags and dark circles under my eyes.  On a Zoom call a few months ago, a co-worker called out my bags under my eyes.  After getting over the embarrassment, I knew they were right.  I've been searching for products to help me but nothing has really worked ... until now.

Within two weeks of using the Eyelighter, I can see a noticeable difference in the puffiness under my eyes and the dark circles have almost disappeared.  The tool is super easy to use and dispense.  I apply the cream directly on my eye using the tool and glide it under my eye and up to the side.  I can feel the build up of liquid under my eyes move out and back into my circulation system and my eyes are less puffy.  The cream actually brightens my eyes as well.

I am so happy with this product and cannot wait to be on another Zoom call with my co-worker and have them comment on how incredible my eyes now look.
faceoff_positive.headline: My new favorite and MUST have skincare product

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this complimentary from BeautyBio The Eyelighter Concentrate as a sample from @beautybio #beautybio and Skeepers. The packaging on this product is one of the most unique I've seen for an eye care product. Unfortunately my product came defective. I pumped and pumped for over 20 minutes and unfortunately could not get the product out to try. I'm sure this is an isolated incident but unfortunately I was unable to get at the product to test.
faceoff_negative.headline: Eyelighter Review
